attributes.action: Publicly support Hong Kong citizens wish to return to British rule.
attributes.background:
Hong Kong was handed over to Beijing by the British in 1997 on the terms of agreement that its liberties will be preserved for 50 years.

Recent protests suggest that the agreement has been violated by Beijing. Online pools suggest that 90% of Hong Kong citizens would rather be under British rule.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to raise this issue with the Government of China.
